item.title: Gunman opens fire at Michigan church and sets it ablaze, killing at least 4 and wounding 8
Trump threatens mass firings of federal workers if government shutdown isn't averted, NBC News reports
item.description: The White House last week told federal agencies to begin preparing for mass firings if Congress does not pass a deal to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: Eric Adams drops out of New York City mayoral race
item.description: President Donald Trump has suggested that NYC Mayor Eric Adams and Curtis Sliwa, the Republican nominee, should both drop out of the race.

item.title: GOP leaders say Obamacare tax credit fight can wait until after government shutdown is averted
item.description: President Donald Trump is poised to meet Monday with the top four congressional leaders, as the funding deadline nears.

item.title: JD Vance â€˜confident' the U.S. has 'successfully separated' TikTok from China parent company ByteDance
item.description: Vice President JD Vance weighed in on the president's recent executive order regarding the acquisition of TikTok on "Fox News Sunday."
